title: The Axedale project
brief_description: The construction of a bailey bridge and approaches, as a temporary crossing over the Campaspe River at Axedale to serve traffic while the existing bridge is taken out of service for provision of a new superstructure.
description: The construction of a bailey bridge and approaches, as a temporary crossing over the Campaspe River at Axedale to serve traffic while the existing bridge is taken out of service for provision of a new superstructure.
